src:
Tenggat Sebulan lagi, DPRD DKI Optimistis Pembahasan APBD Rampung
01 Nov 2019, 05:40 by Taufiq Siddiq, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- DPRD DKI Jakarta meyakini pembahasan rancangan APBD 2020 akan rampung sebelum tenggat waktu yang telah di tetapkan Kementerian Dalam Negeri pada 30 November 2019. "Masih cukup sampai 30 November," ujar Wakil Ketua DPRD Muhamad Taufik di kantornya, Jumat 1 November 2019.
Taufik optimistis karena anggota dewan beberapa hari terakhir membahas plafon sementara APBD 2020 sampai larut malam. "Kalau serius kayak ini tiga minggu masih cukup," katanya.
Taufik menyebutkan awal minggu depan pembahasan KUA PPAS sudah bisa dilanjutkan dalam rapat Badan Anggaran DPRD DKI, sehingga setelah itu, KUA PPAS bisa dilanjutkan ke Paripurna untuk kemudian DPRD dan DKI menyepakati MoU rancangan tersebut.
Ia menambahkan dalam pekan depan setelah Mou KUA PPAS, Pemerintah DKI sudah bisa menyerahkan Rancangan APBD 2020 dan kemudian dibahas oleh DPRD.
Taufik mengakui jadwal pembahasan KUA PPAS 2020 molor dari jadwal yang telah disepakati. DPRD sebelumnya dalam Badan Musyawarah menetapkan jadwal pembahasan KUA PPAS pada 1 November sudah sampai di Badan Anggaran.
Namun hingga Jumat pagi, 1 November 2019 komisi di DPRD DKI masih menggelar rapat pembahasan dengan dinas terkait. "Awalnya di komisi tiga hari, tapi tidak bisa karena KUA PPAS harus disisir satu-satu," ujarnya.
text:
Deadline Another month, DKI DPRD is Optimistic that the Budget Discussion is Complete
01 Nov 2019, 05:40 by Taufiq Siddiq, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - DKI Jakarta DPRD believes that the discussion of the 2020 APBD draft will be completed before the deadline set by the Ministry of Home Affairs on 30 November 2019. "Still enough until 30 November," said Deputy Speaker of the DPRD Muhamad Taufik in his office, Friday 1 November 2019.
Taufik is optimistic that the board members have been discussing the provisional ceiling of the 2020 APBD in the last few days until late at night. "If it's serious like this, three weeks is still enough," he said.
Taufik said that early next week the discussion of the KUA PPAS could be continued at the DKI DPRD Budget Board meeting, so after that, the KUA PPAS could proceed to the Plenary Meeting for later the DPRD and DKI agreed to the draft MoU.
He added that in the next week after Mou KUA PPAS, the DKI Government could submit the 2020 APBD Draft and then be discussed by the DPRD.
Taufik acknowledged the discussion schedule for KUA PPAS 2020 was delayed from the agreed schedule. Previously the DPRD in the Deliberation Board determined the schedule for the KUA PPAS discussion on November 1 to reach the Budget Board.
But until Friday morning, November 1, 2019 the commission in the DKI DPRD was still holding a discussion meeting with the relevant offices. "Initially in the three-day commission, but it could not be because KUA PPAS had to be combed one by one," he said.
